org.efaps.jaas

Class LoginHandler.LoginCallbackHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.jaas.LoginHandler.LoginCallbackHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CallbackHandler
    Enclosing class:
    LoginHandler

    protected class LoginHandler.LoginCallbackHandler
extends Object
implements CallbackHandler
    Class used to handle the call to the JAAS login handler. It's used to return the name and password on request from the implementing login modules.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected LoginHandler.LoginCallbackHandler(ActionCallback.Mode _mode, String _name, String _passwd)
      Constructor initializing the action, name and password in this call back handler.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(Callback[] _callbacks)
      The handler sets for instances of NameCallback the given name and for instances of PasswordCallback the given password.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoginHandler.LoginCallbackHandler

        protected LoginHandler.LoginCallbackHandler(ActionCallback.Mode _mode,
                                 String _name,
                                 String _passwd)
        Constructor initializing the action, name and password in this call back handler.
        Parameters:
        _mode - defines mode for which the login is made
        _name - name of the login user
        _passwd - password of the login user
        See Also:
        mode, name, password

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(Callback[] _callbacks)
            throws UnsupportedCallbackException
        The handler sets for instances of NameCallback the given name and for instances of PasswordCallback the given password. TextOutputCallback instances are ignored.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface CallbackHandler
        Parameters:
        _callbacks - callback instances to handle
        Throws:
        UnsupportedCallbackException - for all Callback instances which are not NameCallback, PasswordCallback or TextOutputCallback
